titles.title: Active Assailant Training, Readiness, and Response Act of 2018
To direct the Secretary of Education to make grants to institutions of higher education for active assailant consulting and training programs.
Active Assailant Training, Readiness, and Response Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Active Assailant Training, Readiness, and Response Act of 2018
This bill requires the Department of Education to make grants to institutions of higher education (IHEs) for developing active assailant programs. Under the programs, the IHEs must assist public institutions or facilities (e.g., schools, day care centers, and hospitals) in preparing for and responding to an active assailant.
